title: New: Lost Twin – Where it Hurts
body:
Photo by [Stephanie Mill](http://www.flickr.com/photos/stephaniemillphoto)

Simplicity; I could talk about it all day. For me, it’s the belief in an idea combined with the ability to explore and run with it, failing to be distracted by the incoming assault of injecting musing.

**_Where it Hurts_** is one of those tracks, build on a deep, squelchy melody, with tactile and confronting beats surrounding it, its result is a somber and remarkable little arrangement of music.

[_Where it Hurts_](http://losttwinmusic.bandcamp.com/track/where-it-hurts) is taken from [**Lost Twin**’s](http://losttwinmusic.bandcamp.com/) new LP, _[Birds.](http://losttwinmusic.bandcamp.com/album/birds)_

Via [ZZZap.](https://www.facebook.com/ivanazzzap)
